info.name: Cryptoworth Portfolio Private API
info.description:
Cryptoworth's Private Portfolio API. You can use this API to query data from your portfolio. Please see the help center articles (https://help.cryptoworth.app) for more support or contact using the link below for additional support. This API can only be used by registered business users.

Download the postman collection https://api.cryptoworth.app/docs/Cryptoworth%20Private%20API.postman_collection.json Contact Support: Email: support@cryptoworth.app

query.description: pass a start date in unix millisecond format to query transactions equal or after this date
pass a start date in unix millisecond format to query transactions equal or before this date

request.description: Get all portfolio transactions

response.name: successful response

query.description: pass a start date in unix millisecond format to query transactions equal or after this date
pass a start date in unix millisecond format to query transactions equal or before this date
